Content.Text:
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yippee!
Sandra's Stall is open for business!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I have all kinds of rare and hard
to find items for sale. Get 'em before
they're gone!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Tea House is now open for business!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I have a full menu of tea and
treats to tempt you, so please stop by!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rod's Pets is open for business, yeah!
Check out all our cute pets!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Anyone who wants to buy a pet
or meet some pets should come on by!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Neil's Animals is now open.
My animals have a quality guarantee.
Don't quibble, just buy!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sandra's Stall is closed for the day.
<PAGE>
Tee-hee-hee...
I made a lot of money today!
See you next time!

<FACE_OLIVIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Tea House is closed for the day.
Come again!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rod's Pets is closed now!
Come on back another time.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Neil's Animals is closing for today.
If you missed out on making a purchase,
come back next time.
